name: pucket-it-project

scripts.install: concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: Kevin Linarto, Edbert Tantra, Nikolas Putra, Dimitri Sadikin
